DropZone.placeholder: Drop your file here, or click to browse

Login.welcomeMessage: to AdminJS - the world's leading open-source auto-generated admin panel for your Node.js application that allows you to manage all your data in one place

messages.thereWereValidationErrors: There are validation errors - check them out below
messages.bulkDeleteError: There was an error deleting records. Check out console to see more information
messages.errorFetchingRecords: There was an error fetching records. Check out console to see more information
messages.errorFetchingRecord: There was an error fetching record. Check out console to see more information
messages.noRecordsSelected: You have not selected any records
messages.pickSomeFirstToRemove: In order to remove records, you have to pick them first
messages.error404Resource: Resource of given id: {{resourceId}} cannot be found
messages.error404Action: Resource of given id: {{resourceId}} does not have an action with name: {{actionName}} or you are not authorized to use it!
messages.error404Record: Resource of given id: {{resourceId}} does not have a record with id: {{recordId}} or you are not authorized to use it!
messages.seeConsoleForMore: See development console for more details...
messages.noActionComponent: You have to implement action component for your Action
messages.noRecordsInResource: There are no records in this resource
messages.confirmDelete: Do you really want to remove this item?
messages.welcomeOnBoard_subtitle: Now you are one of us! We prepared a few tips for you to start:
messages.addingResources_subtitle: Learn how to add new resources to the sidebar
messages.customizeActions_subtitle: Modify existing actions or add custom ones
messages.writeOwnComponents_subtitle: How to modify the Look & Feel of AdminJS
messages.customDashboard_subtitle: Learn how to customize the home screen of AdminJS
messages.roleBasedAccess_subtitle: Define access permissions for your AdminJS users
messages.community_subtitle: Talk with the creators of AdminJS and other AdminJS users
messages.foundBug_subtitle: Raise an issue on our GitHub repo
messages.needMoreSolutions_subtitle: We are here to provide you a beautiful UX/UI design and tailor made software based (not only) on AdminJS
messages.keyValuePropertyDefaultDescription: All values are stored as text. Keys must be unique, duplicate keys will not be saved.
messages.componentNotFound_subtitle: You have to specify component which will render this element
